title: Jeff Bezos' girlfriend Lauren Sanchez finalizes divorce with husband Patrick Whitesell
text:
Lauren Sanchez and Patrick Whitesell are finalizing their divorce.

On Friday they reached an agreement for the terms of their divorce and will share joint custody of their son and daughter while dividing the property according to the terms of their prenuptial agreement, legal documents reveal.

Their 14-year marriage came to an end earlier this year when it was revealed Sanchez and Amazon billionaire Jeff Bezos were having an affair.

The divorce is expected to be finalized by the end of the month.

Lauren Sanchez and Patrick Whitesell reached an agreement for the terms of their divorce Friday

Their marriage came to an end when it was revealed Sanchez and Amazon billionaire Jeff Bezos were having an affair

Sanchez dumped her Hollywood super-agent husband Patrick Whitesell for the 55-year-old Amazon billionaire back in May.

Whitesell, 54, has since moved on with Australian beauty Pia Miller, a 35-year-old model and actress.

Sanchez and Whitesell both filed for divorce in early April.

The pair had been working privately with celebrity divorce specialist Laura Wasser for months and have likely ironed out a settlement privately.

Jeff Bezos split from his wife of 25 years MacKenzie in January following news of his affair with Sanchez.

According to Forbes, Whitesell's personal wealth amounts to about $440million while Bezos is worth an estimated $137billion.

Bezos, 55, is worth $114billion, according to Forbes.

The couple, who were married 14 years, will share custody of their two children. Sanchez has a son from a previous relationship

Jeff Bezos split from his wife of 25 years MacKenzie in January following news of his affair with Sanchez

Jeff and Mackenzie went through a very public divorce in the spring, with the Amazon mogul's ex-wife walking away from their marriage with a hefty settlement that included $38 billion worth of Amazon stock.

That came just seven months after the illicit affair between Lauren and Jeff, who were both married when they began their romance, was exposed in the National Enquirer.

Jeff and MacKenzie announced on Twitter in January that they were parting 'as cherished friends' and divorcing 'after a long period of loving exploration and trial separation'.

But within hours it emerged that Bezos was in a relationship with Sanchez.

Whitesell, 54, has since moved on with Australian beauty Pia Miller, a 35-year-old model and actress

Billionaire Jeff Bezos and his girlfriend Lauren Sanchez enjoyed a breakfast outing in Santa Monica with the former news anchor's 13-year-old son this week

However Jeff and Lauren didn't let the public controversy stop them from enjoying a fun-filled summer together, with the pair jetting off on several exotic trips during the warmer months, including a stay on Diane von Furstenberg and Barry Diller's yacht in Venice in August.

Prior to that, the loved-up couple were hosted as guests of billionaire David Geffen aboard his $200 million yacht, enjoying a tour of some of Europe's most exotic locales alongside the music producer and a host of other high-profile guests, including the likes of model Karlie Kloss, Joshua Kushner, and music producer Scooter Braun.

Just last week Bezos and his former news anchor partner Sanchez looked relaxed and comfortable as they made their way to a cafe near Santa Monica pier, along with Lauren's 13-year-old son Evan.

Mother-of-three Lauren was dressed down in a beige sweater with balloon sleeves, which she paired with some tight black jeans, and a pair of simple tan leather sandal.
description: Lauren Sanchez and Patrick Whitesell reached an agreement for the terms of their divorce Friday. The couple, who were married 14 years, will share custody of their two children.
